description: Physicists now believe that massive neutrino detectors—built to observe rare solar and cosmic particles—could also detect extremely light dark matter that traditional experiments miss. By monitoring subtle annual variations in their background signals, observatories like JUNO and Borexino may open a new frontier in uncovering the universe’s most elusive and abundant hidden matter.
title: Neutrino Detectors May Unlock the Search for Light Dark Matter, Physicists Say

description: A new analysis challenges decades-old assumptions about Uranus and Neptune, revealing that both planets may contain far more rock than icy materials. These findings help explain their strange magnetic fields and show that traditional "ice giant" models may be incomplete. Scientists say only dedicated future missions can uncover the true interior makeup of these distant worlds.
title: Uranus and Neptune May Be Rocky Worlds Not Ice Giants, New Research Shows

description: 12A Railway Colony continues to gain attention online after its release on Amazon Prime Video. The film’s thriller setting, plot twists, and the performance of Allari Naresh have made it a trending topic among Telugu audiences.
title: 12A Railway Colony Now Streaming on Amazon Prime Video: What You Need to Know

description: Murder Report (2025) delivers a deep psychological crime story about a serial killer opening up to a desperate reporter. With strong performances and an IMDb rating of 6.6/10, the film is now available to rent on Prime Video India and BMS Stream.
title: Murder Report (2025): A Dark Korean Crime Thriller Now Streaming on Prime Video

description: The upcoming Sophie Turner series Steal is gaining significant traction across social media, thanks to its gritty heist narrative and Turner’s dramatic transformation for the role. Discussions online highlight the suspenseful premise, polished production, and Prime Video’s high-scale promotion.
title: Steal OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Sophie Turner Starrer Movie Online?

description: China made spaceflight history by launching three Long March rockets within just 19 hours, setting a national record. The missions expanded broadband satellite networks and deployed new military and communications spacecraft, highlighting the country’s rapidly growing launch capabilities and ambitious space expansion efforts.
title: China Launches Three Long March Rockets in Under 19 Hours, Setting New National Record

description: The ROG Xbox Ally X and the Xbox Ally went on sale in India in October. Two months later, Asus says the higher-end model is outselling the base model in India. Sales of the ROG Xbox Ally X, priced at Rs. 1,14,990, are "much higher" than the base model ROG Xbox Ally, said Arnold Su, vice president of the company's consumer and gaming PC business in India. Su also launched the country's first ROG Lab premium retail store in Bengaluru on Thursday.
title: Asus' Arnold Su on Xbox Ally X, GeForce RTX 50 Series ROG Laptops and Company's India Retail Plans

description: Here are the five best smartphones priced under Rs. 30,000 that deliver decent gaming performance. The list includes Oppo K13 Turbo, Vivo V60e, Infinix GT 30 Pro 5G, iQOO Z10, and Realme 15 Pro 5G. You can also compare their camera and display specifications, colour options and other features before making the final decision.
title: Best Gaming Smartphones Under Rs. 30,000: Vivo V60e, Oppo K13 Turbo, More

description: Astronomers have witnessed an extraordinary black hole outburst in the galaxy NGC 3783, where material was blasted into space at nearly 20% the speed of light. Triggered by an intense X-ray flare, the ultra-fast winds reveal how supermassive black holes can violently shape their surroundings and influence the evolution of entire galaxies.
title: ESA Telescopes Capture Ultra-Fast Winds Blasting From Distant Supermassive Black Hole

description: Google has upgraded Gemini 2.5 text-to-speech models to give developers more control over tone, pacing and multi-speaker output. The company also improved Search and AI Mode with more inline links, clearer attribution and the global rollout of Preferred Sources. Google is testing new partnerships with news publishers as well, offering AI-powered article overviews and audio briefings that drive users back to original reporting.
title: Google’s Big Gemini AI Updates: AI Models, Search, Preferred Sources and More From the Week

description: Poco M8 Pro has appeared on the US FCC website, revealing details about its battery and connectivity. The Chinese smartphone maker could be preparing a new budget smartphone, according to a report. It could feature up to 12GB RAM and 512GB storage. The handset also showed up on the IMEI database, hinting that its launch might be coming soon.
title: Poco M8 Pro Battery, Connectivity Specifications Leaked via US FCC Listing

description: Misplacing your credit card, having it stolen, or noticing unusual transactions on your account calls for immediate action, with the most important step being blocking it to prevent any fraudulent or unauthorised transactions. ICICI Bank provides multiple online options to block your credit card instantly. Here's how to block your ICICI Credit Card online.
title: How to Block ICICI Bank Credit Card Using Different Methods Online: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: Microsoft has partnered with Cognizant, Infosys, TCS and Wipro to deploy more than 2,00,000 Copilot licences and accelerate the adoption of agentic AI across India’s IT services sector. Each firm will use Copilot internally and build multi-agent solutions for clients. Cognizant is acting as “client zero,” Infosys is integrating Microsoft’s intelligence layer into Topaz and Cobalt, TCS will offer AI coaching and automation across departments, and Wipro is launching a new Innovation Hub.
title: Microsoft Partners With Cognizant, Infosys, TCS and Wipro Over Agentic AI Adoption in India

description: Researchers in South Korea have developed a carbon-titanium composite that significantly enhances the performance of lithium-sulfur batteries. By embedding titanium monoxide nanoparticles into nitrogen-doped porous carbon, the team created a honeycomb electrode that improves conductivity, stabilizes sulfur, and prevents energy-sapping chemical losses. The new design delivers higher capacity and longer battery life, making lithium-sulfur cells more practical for electric vehicles, drones, and portable electronics. This breakthrough could lead to lighter batteries with faster charging and lower production costs.
title: New Carbon-Titanium Composite Dramatically Improves Lithium-Sulfur Batteries

description: Redmi Note 15 Pro+ 5G, Redmi Note 15 Pro 5G and Redmi Note 15 5G have been launched in Poland. They carry dual rear cameras and up to 6,500mAh battery. The Redmi Note 15 Pro+ 5G, and Redmi Note 15 Pro 5G have a 200-megapixel main rear camera, while the standard verison has a 108-megapixel primary rear camera.
title: Redmi Note 15 Pro+ 5G, Redmi Note 15 Pro 5G With 6,500mAh Battery Launched Globally Alongside Redmi Note 15 5G: Price, Specifications

description: Adobe has added ChatGPT app support for Photoshop, Express and Acrobat, allowing users to edit images, create designs and work with PDFs directly inside the chatbot. Available on web, desktop and iOS for all tiers. The integration uses secure connectors and authentication. Users can make Photoshop edits via text prompts, generate or modify Express designs, and perform Acrobat tasks such as extracting tables or compressing PDFs, without opening the standalone apps.
title: Adobe Photoshop, Express and Acrobat Can Now Be Accessed Within ChatGPT

description: Bitcoin slipped after briefly surging past $94,000 following the US Federal Reserve’s 25bps rate cut, with traders reacting to mixed commentary from Fed Chair Powell. Weak liquidity, inconsistent inflows, and subdued on-chain activity limited the upside. Altcoins also traded more softly as macro sensitivity remained high.
title: Bitcoin Slips as Fed’s Mixed Tone Keeps Market in a Narrow Range

description: CP Plus has partnered with Qualcomm to build a new generation of India-focused AI video intelligence systems for public infrastructure, enterprises, homes and industrial deployments. Powered by Qualcomm’s Dragonwind processors and Insight Platform, the solutions will process footage on-device and at the edge for faster alerts, lower bandwidth use and better data privacy. CP Plus will also offer an LLM-based assistant for natural-language queries about footage.
title: CP Plus and Qualcomm Partner to Introduce AI-Powered Video Intelligence Systems in India

description: Google AI Plus plan was rolled out in India on Tuesday, marking the company’s introduction of an entry-level artificial intelligence (AI) subscription in the country. The plan directly competes with OpenAI’s ChatGPT Go plan, which was first introduced in India, considering the country’s price-sensitive nature. Both plans have their own benefits and extra perks. Additionally, their prices are also similar, which can lead to confusion among individuals on which plan to choose.
title: Google AI Plus vs ChatGPT Go: Which Is The Best Value for Money AI Subscription in India

description: James Gunn’s Superman (2025) delivers a powerful new vision of the Man of Steel, blending heart, action, and modern storytelling. Now available on JioHotstar, it promises an inspiring and meaningful superhero experience.
title: James Gunn’s Superman (2025) Now Streaming on JioHotstar: What You Need to Know

description: OnePlus 15R Ace Edition will be launched in India alongside the standard OnePlus 15R model, the company announced on Thursday. It will be offered as the third colourway for the OnePlus 15R, joining the previously revealed Charcoal Black and Mint Green shades. The Electric Violet variant of the OnePlus 15R is confirmed to have cosmetic differences compared to the other two colour options, while the handset’s core specifications will remain identical.
title: OnePlus 15R Ace Edition India Launch Date, Availability Details Announced

description: The OTT platforms are set to hit your screens with intense dramas, action, adventure, and more for the week. Top releases include Single Papa, Saali Mohabbat, F1, and more.
title: OTT Releases of the Week (Dec 8 - Dec 14): Saali Mohabbat, Kaantha, Superman, F1 The Movie, Single Papa, and More

description: Pushparaj Rai’s Aarata (2024) brings a grounded, emotional look at village life, tradition, and conflict. Now on Prime Video India as a rental title, the film blends culture, drama, and strong performances.
title: Pushparaj Rai’s Aarata is Now Available for Rent on Prime Video

description: Sei Network’s wallet will now come pre-installed on new Xiaomi smartphones in global markets outside China and the US, giving millions of users immediate access to on-chain tools. The announcement triggered volatility in the SEI token, which saw sharp intraday swings as traders assessed the impact. User reactions on X highlighted both optimism around accessibility and ongoing concerns about complexity. The long-term effect will depend on adoption, regulation, and how Sei expands the app’s functionality.
title: Sei Partners Xiaomi to Pre-Install DeFi Wallet on Phones, SEI Token Sees Rapid Price Moves

description: The TRAPPIST-1 planetary system, located about 39 light-years from Earth, hosts seven rocky worlds orbiting a cool red dwarf star. While several of these Earth-sized planets lie in the star’s habitable zone, new observations from the James Webb Space Telescope suggest their atmospheres may be too thin to support life. Earlier hints of methane around TRAPPIST-1e now appear to be background noise, strengthening the case that intense stellar radiation has likely stripped these planets of the gases needed to maintain surface water.
title: TRAPPIST-1e Methane Signal Likely False, Webb Data Suggests Airless Planet

description: Motorola appears to be working on a book-style foldable smartphone. Motorola has sent a CES 2026 invitation to several users, indicating the arrival of the new form factor. The invitation includes a box that appears to have the tagline 'Every fold reveals a possibility.' Motorola’s foldables so far have only included vertically folding clamshell-style phones. Motorola's purported foldable will rival the Galaxy Z Fold series and Pixel Fold smartphones.
title: Motorola Hints at Book-Style Foldable Smartphone That Could Compete With the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7

description: Redmi 15C 5G is now available in India, and this budget-friendly Xiaomi sub-brand phone features a 50-megapixel rear camera and runs on a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset. It offers up to 8GB RAM and 128GB storage, ships with Android 15 and HyperOS 2, and is slated to get two years of OS updates along with four years of security patches.
title: Redmi 15C 5G With 6,000mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Camera Goes on Sale in India: Price, Specifications, Features

description: Apple opened its latest store in India on Tuesday. Named Apple Noida, it is the company’s second store in the Delhi-NCR region and the fifth store in India overall. It is located at the Delhi Mall of India in Sector 18, Noida. Like the preceding outlets, Apple Noida offers a full range of services for Apple devices. Customers can purchase Apple products and accessories, receive personalised help from specialists, experience hands-on ‘Today at Apple’ sessions, and get support and repair services.
title: Apple Noida Opens Its Doors to Customers as the Second Apple Store in Delhi-NCR

description: Google, on Wednesday, announced official support for the Model Context Protocol (MCP) across its portfolio of services and Google Cloud products. The company said these fully-managed remote servers will make it easier for developers to connect artificial intelligence (AI) agents, such as those powered by Gemini or other AI models. With real-world tools, data sources and enterprise systems.
title: Google Launches MCP Servers to Let AI Agents Connect to Third-Party Data Sources

description: Vivo X300 and X300 Pro are the company's latest flagship phones but another X series phone could be on the way. Reports suggest the company is working on the Vivo X200T, featuring a compact design and performance similar to last year’s X200. The device is expected to launch in India soon, so users may not have to wait long for its official debut.
title: Vivo X200T Launch Timeline, Key Specifications Leaked; Could Feature Zeiss Cameras, Compact Design

description: Instagram has announced a new 'Your Algorithm' tool powered by AI. With this new feature, the Meta-owned company is aiming to provide more personalised recommendations for users. This new feature will appear in the top right corner of Reels with an icon that looks like two lines with hearts. It is available in the US from today and will roll out for more users soon.
title: Instagram Introduces 'Your Algorithm' Tool That Lets You Shape Recommendations in Your Reels Tab

description: Spotify on Wednesday announced a new feature that provides users with more control over the streaming service’s algorithm. Dubbed Prompted Playlist, it is currently rolling out in beta to select global markets. As per the company, users can describe what they want to hear and set rules for the personalised playlists. Prompted Playlist is claimed to tap into the user’s Spotify listening history from day one, and they can fine-tune the results by editing the prompt or begin again with a new one.
title: Spotify’s New Prompted Playlist Feature Provides More Control Over Your Listening Algorithm

description: Vivo X300 Ultra is said to be in the works. The handset has now received a certification from the China Compulsory Certification (3C) authority ahead of its official launch. The listing suggests the fast-charging speed of the upcoming handset. The upcoming model could offer an upgrade in charging speed over the Vivo X200 Ultra. The Vivo X300 Ultra is expected to come with Sa napdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset and a 6.8-inch display with 2K resolution.
title: Vivo X300 Ultra Surfaces on 3C Certification Website, Charging Specifications Revealed

description: Following the launch of the iPad Pro (2025), Apple is said to be gearing up to introduce several new iPad models next year. According to a report, the Cupertino-based tech giant’s 2026 iPad roadmap includes an entry-level iPad powered by an A19 chipset, as well as an iPad Air with a faster processor. Both models are rumoured to come with Apple’s proprietary wireless networking chip, which was introduced with the latest iPhone 17 models this year.
title: Apple’s 2026 iPad Lineup Reportedly Leaked; A19 iPad and M4 iPad Air Said to Debut

description: Google on Wednesday announced a new feature for Android, which allows users to get help from emergency services via a real-time video feed. Dubbed Emergency Live Video, a dispatcher can send a request to the phone to share a live video, allowing responders to quickly assess the situation until help arrives. It is said to be built on Android's Emergency Location Service (ELS), which provides accurate location fixes and additional emergency information for Android phones during emergency situations.
title: Google Announces Emergency Live Video for Sharing Visual Information with Emergency Services on Android
